name: Perfect-responsive-columns
body:
### Perfect Responsive Columns. Perfect Responsive Columns is a 10 columns based responsive grid system. ### Classes .one_tenth = 10 .one_ninth = 9 .one_eighth = 8 .one_seventh = 7 .one_sixth = 6 .one_fifth = 5 .one_fourth = 4 or 1/4 .one_third = 3 or 1/3 .one_half = 2 .two_thirds = 2/3 .full_width = 1 ``` $ cd your_repo_root/Perfect-Responsive-Columns $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ``` If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch. ### The Markup
one_fifth
one_fifth
one_fifth
one_fifth
one_fifth
### Compatability Tested on all major browsers, also compatible with Internet explorer 6 and up. ### Authors and Contributors Connect with me on twitter @anthony_porto. ### Support or Contact Check out demo page at http://tonyporto.com/blog/perfect-columns-grid/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
